snippet: Specialists in ocean exploration and recovery cautioned that a successful identification of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370’s wreckage might take weeks or months.
abstract: Australian officials have waxed optimistic in excitement of detecting four bursts of signals that might have originated from the flight recorders of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370; specialists in ocean exploration and recovery caution, however, that a successful identification of wreckage might take weeks or months.
lead_paragraph: Specialists in ocean exploration and recovery cautioned that a successful identification of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370’s wreckage might take weeks or months.

headline.main: After Optimism of More Pings, Reality of Long Jet Search Settles In
headline.print_headline: After Optimism of More Pings, Reality of Long Jet Search Settles In
